CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 14, 1950, pg. 10, reads: "LOVELY BRIDE...was Miss Beatrice Scott, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Robert E. Scott, who married Charlie A. (Teenie) Harris Jr., son of Courier photographer, "Teenie" Harris, Oct. 8, in a charming home wedding. Betty Scott, the bride's sister, was maid of honor, and Leonard Harley was best man.  The groom will enter the Army, Oct. 20.  The Rev. Clarence E. McFadden performed the ceremony.  A reception followed the rites. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of bride Beatrice Scott Harris wearing wedding gown with lace overlay, holding bouquet and seated on arm of sofa, in Scott residence, 7503 Tioga Street
